about_the_game:
Build and develop your army, expand your territory, and fight those other guys at the other side of the map in this fantasy grid-based tactics game - all played in real-time! Harvest Spirit Amber in order to forge powerful artifacts and abilities.

AmberForge is a fantasy real-time tactics wargame that borrows mechanics from RTS games as well as grid-based tactics games - StarCraft meets Fire Emblem!

Features:
  • Real time online multiplayer PvP (1v1)
  • Unique buildings, units, and upgrades
  • Various resources throughout the map to harvest
  • Different strategies and army compositions to employ
  • Macro and micro techniques that are easy to learn and hard to master
